body:
Heres some more rushing strategies. Enjoy!
The reason I abbreviated Camp Erbosi is because the title was to long :P

Link: http://youtu.be/CmTVJnYjvaY

Also, if you have any additional strategies and/or feedback, feel free to comment below.

replies.body: My basic rushing strategy for every map is: either go really high, go underground, or go really far left or right off the map.
